product_name: Boardworks Super Natural Stand Up Paddleboard
long_description: Built for flatwater and surf, the Boardworks Super Natural Stand Up Paddlebaord connects you to the calming experience of being on the water thanks to its stable design and high-quality construction. Board is built for stability whether you're just beginning or have mastered the surf; 10 ft. 6 in. board has a 31 in. width and the 11 ft. 6 in. board has a 33 in. width. 11 ft. 6 in. board suits large paddlers with a 245 lb. weight capacity; 10 ft. 6 in. boards suits paddlers up to 202 lbs. Single density, stringerless, hand-shaped EPS core is laminated with epoxy resin and then painted with automotive-grade paint and a polish coat. Deck pad provides comfortable traction underfoot. Center fin promotes straight tracking in the water. Center handle makes transporting the Boardworks Super Natural Stand Up Paddleboard a breeze.
short_description: Built for flatwater and surf, the Boardworks Super Natural Stand Up Paddlebaord connects you to the calming experience of being on the water thanks to its stable design and high-quality construction.
